Class DataRestProperties

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.boot.data.rest.autoconfigure.DataRestProperties
@ConfigurationProperties("spring.data.rest") public class DataRestProperties extends Object
Configuration properties for Spring Data REST.
Since:
4.0.0
Author:
Stephane Nicoll
